attributes.action: bolster his plan for competitive team spors by making Hockey a choice for both male and female students at school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a hockey player for 15 years, I have seen a decline in Hockey mainly due to the lack participation in schools.  Clubs are having to attract players into the sport at an early age because schools aren't playing hockey as much as they did.  Please include Hockey with football, cricket, rugby and netball as a competitive team sport in schools.

Thank you Prime Minister
